GK20ksakunau:2513: nūnaṃ me sucarita-pratibandhakaṃ purā-kṛtaṃ teṣu divaseṣu pariṇāmā1bhimukham āsīd yena sānukrośo 'py ārya-putro mayi virasaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /

GK20ksakunau:2517: * mohān mayā sutanu pūrvam upekṣitas te

GK20ksakunau:2523: KSak_7.25:>3% rājā -- asmād aṅgulīyo1palambhāt khalu smṛtir upalabdhā /

GK20ksakunau:2589: * yathā gajo ne7ti samakṣa-rūpe tasminn apakrāmati saṃśayaḥ syāt /

GK20ksakunau:2611: KSak_7.32:>2% mārīca -- vatsa kaccid abhinanditas tvayā vidhivad asmābhir
GK20ksakunau:2613: KSak_7.32:>3% rājā -- bhagavann atra khalu me vaṃśa-pratiṣṭhā /
GK20ksakunau:2615: KSak_7.33:<1% mārīca -- tathā-bhāvinam enaṃ cakra-vartinam avagacchatu bhavān /

GK20ksakunau:2640: * tava bhavatu viḍaujāḥ prājyavṛṣṭiḥ prajāsu * tvam api vitata-yajño vajriṇaṃ prīṇayasva
GK20ksakunau:2643: KSak_7.34:>1% rājā -- bhagavan yathā-śakti śreyase yatiṣye /
